snippet.title: Saturday scoreboard: Illawarra and South Coast live sport blog
snippet.content: The Mercury's weekly live blog is covering all the action from the region's sporting field. From Helensburgh to Nowra - and sometimes beyond - we'll have all the score updates from all codes. Want to be part of it? Send your official scores or photos and videos from the game to the Mercury sport Twitter handle @mercury_sports or Facebook page, Illawarra Mercury Sport. Or if you've got an upcoming event for your club or association, of any sport, at any level, email tbarrow@fairfaxmedia.com.au and we will include it on the blog. Join Mercury sports editor Tim Barrow from 2.30-5pm.
